scripts.static: stylus -w static_src/css/main.styl -o static/css/main.css & watch 'cp -rf static_src/js/* static/js/' static_src/js/ & watch 'cp -rf static_src/img static/img' static_src/img/
scripts.build: stylus static_src/css/main.styl -o static/css/main.css && cp -rf static_src/img static/img && for i in `ls static_src/js`;do node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o static/js/$i -- static_src/js/$i; done
